topics.body:
"@Bryon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542b38a46368724cc25b0100#post_542b38a46368724cc25b0100
The thing people massively forget is that the usa is JUST now accepting other current cultures into it's mainstream culture.  What I mean by this is think about how many times people have gone unironically talking about 'Murrica's culture being "invaded" or something like that.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542b38ac6368724cf43d0100#post_542b38ac6368724cf43d0100
Other countries got Dubbed Toku and there were a few hits. (The Pinoys love Bioman and Kamen rider black)

Okay, The Executives could have something to do with it. (Hollywood did insert an american actor in the first godzilla movie)

Edit: Or americans could just be terrible people.
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542b39326368722258250000#post_542b39326368722258250000
It's the second one; Hollywood has it's ass up it's head hard.

For example what I was talking about how anime is just now becoming a part of mainstream western culture; the reason why past attempts at bringing the anime industry to the west have failed is because the people that have done it are fucking idiots that think just cause you emulate a art style means you capture it's metaphorical soul of why people like it.



To further the analogy think of it as the difference between Godzilla 2001 and Godzilla 2014.
Godzilla 2001: We'll only allow Godzilla to come to the USA if we do it the 'Murrican way!
Godzilla 2014: Let's make a Godzilla movie.
